A Brief Description About Myself


Hello,


Welcome to my page.


My full name is Kwasi Obuadum Obiri. I am a Ghanaian by birth and I come from Kwahu in the Eastern region.

I am a student at the University Of Ghana. I'm a resident of Mensah Sarbah Hall.

I am offering BSc Information Technology.

I am curious by nature and as such I tend to try my hands on various things to see where my interests lie.

I like to research mostly on things involving technology and cars. And yes, I'm a car guy. I find them interesting.

I aspire to be the best in any area I find myself.
